testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login".passed And User enters Email as "Admin" and Password as "admin123".................passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then Page Title should be "OrangeHRM".......................................passed When User click on mendauser link...........................................passed When User click on Log out link.............................................passed Then Page Title should be "OrangeHRM".......................................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
